short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 95 percent of streamers have less than 5 viewers, discover them !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to discover Twitch streamers according to criteria such as game, language and the maximum number of viewers.
You can also click the randomize button next to the Twitch search bar.
